EligibilityWorkflow: <!-- Default 1 - Enable Eligibility Workflow - displays the Eligibility Question. [1 = Enable Eligibility workflow / 0 = Disable Eligibility workflow] -->
NumEligibilityReaders: <!-- Default 1 - Specify the number of Eligibility Readers. Possible values = 1, 2 -->
ShowPETImagingParameters: <!-- Default 1 - Display PET Imaging parameter information. [1 = Display / 0 = Do not display] -->
ShowMRIContrastSummary: <!-- Default 1 - Display MRI Contrast Summary. [1 = Display / 0 = Do not display] -->
DisplaySequenceDetails: <!-- Default 1 - Display Sequence Details. [1 = Display / 0 = Do not display] -->
DisplayDiseaseIndication: <!-- Default 1 - Display Disease Indication. [1 = Query BioPACS at the subject level for ‘Indication’ field / 2 = Show hard coded value] -->
DiseaseIndicationValue: <!-- Default <EMPTY> - Hard coded value for Disease Indication. [if DisplayDiseaseIndication = "2" then show hard coded value] -->
ScreeningPopUpMessage: <!-- Default 0 - Display pop-up if no target lesions at screening. [1 = Display / 0 = Do not display] -->
AllowBusinessModality: <!-- Default ALL - CT,MR,PET,PET-CT,PET-MR,NM,X-Ray List of Business Modalities that are allowed or 'ALL' -->
BlockBusinessModality: <!-- Default <EMPTY> - List of Business Modalities that need to be blocked -->
ReadOnlyBusinessModality: <!-- Default <EMPTY> - List of Business Modalities where ROIs cannot be created. -->
BlockSequenceModality: <!-- Default <EMPTY> - List of Study Modalities that need to be blocked (Overrides to Business Modalities) -->
ReadOnlySequenceModality: <!-- Default <EMPTY> - List of Study Modalities where ROIs cannot be created. (Overrides to Business Modalities) -->
ImageDecimalPrecision: <!-- Default 0 - Decimal precision on Image Display <n> -->
AllowAnatomical: <!-- Default ALL - List of Anatomical areas that are allowed or 'ALL' -->
BlockAnatomical: <!-- Default <EMPTY> - List of Anatomical areas that need to be blocked. -->
StartDateRequiredBaseline: <!-- Default 1 - [1 = Start date is required at Screening for reading to proceed / 0 = Start date is not required at Screening for reading to proceed] -->
StartDateType: <!-- Default 1 - 1-Dosing, 2-Randomization, 3-Enrolment [Start Date is defined for this study] -->
LimitTargetLesions: <!-- Default 5 - Maximum number of Target lesions allowed / -1 = no limit -->
LimitTargetLesionsPerOrgan: <!-- Default 2 - Maximum number of Target lesions per organ / -1 = no limit -->
LimitNTLesions: <!-- Default 10 - Maximum number of Non Target lesions allowed / -1 = no limit -->
LimitNewLesions: <!-- Default 10 - Maximum number of New lesions allowed / -1 = no limit -->
LimitNewLesionsPerOrgan: <!-- Default 2 - Maximum number of New lesions per organ / -1 = no limit-->
ExtranodalBaselineThreshold: <!-- Default 10 - Threshold value for Extranodal lesions at Baseline -->
NodalBaselineThreshold: <!-- Default 15 - Threshold value for Nodal lesions at Baseline -->
NodalNormalLesionThreshold: <!-- Default 10 - Threshold for considering Nodal lesions as normal -->
IsReliablyMeasuredTarget: <!-- Default 0 - Target lesion reliably measured Question visibility. [1 = Display / 0 = Do not display] -->
NTFluidWithNoPriorResolved: <!-- Default 1 - Provide ‘Present with progression’ status in context menu for non target fluid lesions with no prior status of resolved [1 = Allow / 0 = Do not allow] -->
NTFluidWithPriorResolved: <!-- Default 1 - Provide ‘Present with progression’ status in context menu for non target fluid lesions with a prior status of resolved  [1 = Allow / 0 = Do not allow] -->
FluidLocationsForNewLesions: <!-- Default 1 - Allow fluid locations for new lesions [1 = Yes / 0 = No -->
ConfirmationRequired: <!-- Default 1 - [1 = Require confirmation for PR and CR | 0 = Confirmation not required for PR and CR] -->
ConfirmingCRRule: <!-- Default 0 - [1 = Allow PR between confirming CR | 0 = Do not allow PR between confirming CR] -->
SDRuleDays: <!-- Default 42 - Timepoint response of SD that falls < n days from the start date, will be considered NE -->
RequiresConfirmationDays: <!-- Default 28 - Number of days required between the initial and confirmatory time point for confirming response -->
AddOneInFormula: <!-- Default 1 - Calculate DaysOnStudy = (Time point response date – start date) + ValueOfSetting -->
PercentageChangeNadirPD: <!-- Default 20 - % Change from Nadir SOD for calculating Target Response as PD (>= value%). -->
PercentageChangeBaselinePR: <!-- Default -30 - % Change from Baseline SOD for calculating Target Response as PR (-100 < % Change Baseline SOD <= value) -->
TPRDateForPD: <!-- Default 0 - For Date of Progression [0 = Earliest exam date | 1= Latest exam date | 2= Use LesionTypes] -->
TPRDateForNonPD: <!-- Default 1 - For Date of First Response [0 = Earliest exam date | 1= Latest exam date  -->
TPRNEWhenNTNE: <!-- Default 0 - [1 = TPR Overrides to NE when Non target response is NE / 0 = Do not override -->
DecimalPlacesForActualvalues: <!-- Default 2 - Number of decimal places for rounding Actual values -->
DecimalPlacesForFinalvalues: <!-- Default 0 - Number of decimal places for rounding Final values -->
DecimalPlacesForPercentage: <!-- Default 0 - Number of decimal places for rounding Percentages -->
UnequivocalProgression: <!-- Default 1 - Confirm Unequivocal Progression for Non-Target Lesions [1 = Display the confirmatory question / 0 = Do not display the confirmatory question] -->
PseudoProgression: <!-- Default 1 - Pseudo Progression Question visibility [1 = Display the question / 0 = Do not display the question] -->
DOPAtFollowUp: <!-- Default 0 - Display DOP at follow up [1 = Display | 0 = Do not Display ] -->
DOFRAtFollowUp: <!-- Default 0 - Display DOFR at follow up [1 = Display | 0 = Do not Display ] -->
BestResponseAtFollowUp: <!-- Default 0 - Display Best Timepoint response at follow up [1 = Display | 0 = Do not Display ] -->
PreviouslyIrradiatedTarget: <!-- Default 1 - Previously Irradiated Target lesion Question visibility [1 = Display the question / 0 = Do not display the question] -->
PreviouslyIrradiatedNonTarget: <!-- Default 1 - Previously Irradiated Non Target lesion Question visibility [1 = Display the question / 0 = Do not display the question] -->
AllowBCSPAtBaseline: <!-- Default 1 - [1 = Display BCSP form at Baseline / 0 = Do not display BCSP at Baseline] -->
AllowBCSPAtFollowup: <!-- Default 1 - [1 = Display BCSP form at Followup / 0 = Do not display BCSP at Followup] -->
AllowBCSPAtGlobal: <!-- Default 1 - [1 = Display BCSP form at Global / 0 = Do not display BCSP at Global] -->
AllowBCSPAtAdjudication: <!-- Default 1 - [1 = Display BCSP form at Adjudication / 0 = Do not display BCSP at Adjudication] -->
EndPointListWithOrder: <!-- Specify the list of Adjudication variables (question text IDs) along with order like: BestResponse, DateProgression, DateFirstResponse -->
ShowStartDateInAdj: <!-- Default 1 - Display Start date in Adjudication session [1 = Display / 0 = Do not display] -->
IsClinicalPresent: <!-- Default 0 - Enable Clinical Assessment Session 5 [1 = Yes / 0 = No] -->
AddDaysAfterMaxDateClinical: <!-- Default 28 - Select a date within the max date + [value + 1] days to the radiology max date of the previous time point (date after the last radiology exam) + [Value] days after the current radiological time point response date -->
AllowBCSPAtClinical: <!-- Default 0 - [1 = Display BCSP form at Clinical / 0 = Do not display BCSP at Clinical] -->
IsOncologyPresent: <!-- Default 0 - Enable Full Oncology Session 5 [1 = Yes / 0 = No] -->
AddDaysAfterMaxDateOncology: <!-- Default 14 - Select a date within the max date + [value + 1] days to the radiology max date of the previous time point (date after the last radiology exam) + [Value] days after the current radiological time point response date -->
IsTargetAllowedOncology: <!-- Default 0 - Enable Target lesions on Oncology [1 = Yes / 0 = No] -->
LimitTargetLesionsOncology: <!-- Default 2 - Maximum number of Target lesions allowed Oncology -->
LimitNTLesionsOncology: <!-- Default 10 - Maximum number of Non Target lesions allowed Oncology -->
LimitNewLesionsOncology: <!-- Default 10 - Maximum number of New lesions allowed Oncology -->
LimitTargetLesionsOverall: <!-- Default 5 - Maximum number of Target lesions allowed Overall -->
LimitNTLesionsOverall: <!-- Default 10 - Maximum number of Non Target lesions allowed Overall -->
LimitNewLesionsOverall: <!-- Default 10 - Maximum number of New lesions allowed Overall -->
AllowBCSPAtOncology: <!-- Default 0 - [1 = Display BCSP form at Oncology / 0 = Do not display BCSP at Oncology] -->
EnableSUVMax: <!-- Default 1 - Enable SUVmax [1 = Enable SUVmax / 0 = Disable SUVmax] -->
EnableSUVMean: <!-- Default 1 - Enable SUVmean [1 = Enable SUVmean / 0 = Disable SUVmean] -->
EnableSUVStdDev: <!-- Default 1 - Enable SUVStddev [1 = Enable SUVStddev / 0 = Disable SUVStddev] -->
EnableSUVPeak: <!-- Default 1 - Enable SUVpeak [1 = Enable SUVpeak / 0 = Disable SUVpeak] -->
EnableCTVolume: <!-- Default 0 - Enable CT Volume [1 = Enable CT Volume / 0 = Disable CT Volume] -->
EnablePETVolume: <!-- Default 0 - Enable PET Volume [1 = Enable PET Volume / 0 = Disable PET Volume] -->
EnablePETTLG: <!-- Default 0 - Enable PET TLG [1 = Enable PET TLG / 0 = Disable PET TLG] -->
EnableFDGAvid: <!-- Default 0 - Enable FDG Avidity [1 = Enable FDG Avidity / 0 = Disable FDG Avidity]-->
EnableBackgroundSUVMax: <!-- Default 1 - Enable Background SUVMax [1 = Enable Background SUVmax / 0 = Disable Background SUVmax] -->
EnableBackgroundSUVMean: <!-- Default 1 - Enable Background SUVmean [1 = Enable Background SUVmean / 0 = Disable Background SUVmean] -->
EnableBackgroundSUVStdDev: <!-- Default 1 - Enable Background SUVStddev [1 = Enable Background SUVStddev / 0 = Disable Background SUVStddev] -->
EnableBackgroundSUVPeak: <!-- Default 1 - Enable Background SUVpeak [1 = Enable Background SUVpeak / 0 = Disable Background SUVpeak] -->
EnableSpleen: <!-- Default 0 - Enable Spleen [1 = Enable Spleen / 0 = Disable Spleen] -->
EnableCTPETIntergration: <!-- Default 0 - Enable CT PET Integration [1 = Enable / 0 = Disable] -->
ScrPopUPMsgIfNoMeasTarget: <!-- Default 0 - Display pop-up if no target lesions measuring >= 15mm at screening. [1 = Display / 0 = Do not display] -->
EnableBackgroundMuscle: <!-- Default 1 - Enable BKG3 [ 1= Enable BKG3 / 0 = Disable BKG3] -->
LimitIndexLesions: <!-- Default 6 - Maximum number of Index lesions allowed / -1 = Set no limit -->
LimitNonIndexLesions: <!-- Default 10 - Maximum number of NonIndex lesions allowed / -1 = Set no limit -->
DefaultCTIndexThreshold: <!-- Default 5 - CT lesions TSTM value (on fail take label from DB) -->
CTIndexLesionLabel: <!-- Default CI - CT Index lesion Label (on fail take label from DB) -->
CTNonIndexLesionLabel: <!-- Default CNI - CT Non-Index lesion Label (on fail take label from DB) -->
CTNewLesionLabel: <!-- Default CN - CT New lesion Label (on fail take label from DB) -->
PETIndexLesionLabel: <!-- Default PI - PET Index lesion Label (on fail take label from DB) -->
PETNonIndexLesionLabel: <!-- Default PNI - PET Non-Index lesion Label (on fail take label from DB) -->
PETNewLesionLabel: <!-- Default PN - PET New lesion Label (on fail take label from DB) -->
AllowInitialMissingPETNewLesion: <!-- Default 0 - allow PET New lesion to be added as missing at initial draw [1 = Allow / 0 = Do not allow] -->
PETNewLesionStatus: <!-- Default 0 - Initial draw of new PET lesion, auto-populate or readers choice[0 = Auto / 1 = Reader Choice] -->
EnableIndexLesionsSplit: <!-- Default 0 - Split Index Lesion [1 = Enable / 0 = Disable] -->
EnableIndexLesionsMerge: <!-- Default 0 - Merge Index Lesion [1 = Enable / 0 = Disable] -->
ConsiderNewLesionFivePoint: <!-- Default 0 - Consider New Lesion for 5 Point Scale [1 = Considered New Lesion / 0 = Not Considered New Lesion] -->
PercentageSPDChangeBaselinePR: <!-- Default -50 - %SPD Change from Screening must regress by [value] compared to screening -->
SUVmaxPercentChange: <!-- Default 1 - Compared to SUV max of the worst lesion [1 = Screening / 2 = Nadir / 3 = Using Nadir when CMR/PMR] -->
SpleenASVStartingPoint: <!-- Default 130 - if the Screening spleen measurement is <= [value] mm, the ASV will be captured as 0 mm. -->
SUVmaxPercentageIncrease: <!-- Default 25 - A significant increase in FDG uptake, defined as a >= [value]% increase in the %ΔSUVmax of the most FDG-avid disease -->
SUVmaxPercentageDecrease: <!-- Default -25 - Reduced uptake will be defined as a <= [value]% decrease in the %ΔSUVmax -->
RoundDecmialPlacesForActualvalues: <!-- Default 2 - Number of decimal places for rounding Actual values -->
RoundDecmialPlacesForFinalvalues: <!-- Default 0 - Number of decimal places for rounding Final values -->
RoundDecmialPlacesForPercentage: <!-- Default 0 - Number of decimal places for rounding Percentages -->
PreviouslyIrradiatedIndex: <!-- Default 1 - Previously Irradiated Index lesion Question visibility [1 = Display the question / 0 = Donot display the question] -->
PreviouslyIrradiatedNonIndex: <!-- Default 1 - Previously Irradiated Non-Index lesion Question visibility [1 = Display the question / 0 = Donot display the question] -->
AddUptakeAnsOptionsInFivePointScreening: <!-- Default 1 - Add Additional Uptake Answer options in FivePoint question at screening [1 = Add / 0 = Donot add] -->
AllowBCSPInSession1: <!-- Default 0 - Display the BCSP form (loaded to the baseline/screening time point) in BioPACS, if available, in Baseline [1 = Display / 0 = Do not display] -->
AllowBCSPInSession2: <!-- Default 0 - Display the BCSP form (loaded to the baseline/screening time point) in BioPACS, if available, in follow up [1 = Display / 0 = Do not display] -->
AllowBCSPInSession3: <!-- Default 0 - Display the BCSP form (loaded to the baseline/screening time point) in BioPACS, if available, in Global [1 = Display / 0 = Do not display] -->
AllowBCSPInSession4: <!-- Default 0 - Display the BCSP form (loaded to the baseline/screening time point) in BioPACS, if available, in Adjudication [1 = Display / 0 = Do not display] -->
AllowClinDataInAllSession: <!-- Default 0 - Display the Clindata form (loaded to the baseline/screening time point) in BioPACS, if available, in all sessions [1 = Display / 0 = Do not display] -->
AllowClinDataTimepointLevel: <!-- Default 0 - Display the ClinData form (uploaded at TP level), at corresponding follow up timepoint, if available. [1 = Display / 0 = Do not display] -->
IsClinicalEnabled: <!-- Default 0 - [1 = Enable Clinical Session / 0 = Disable Clinical Session] -->
EnableModifiedResponse: <!-- Default 1 - [1 = Enable Modified Response / 0 = Disable Modified Response] -->
AddDaysAfterMaxDate: <!-- Default 28 - Select a date within the max date + [value + 1] days to the radiology max date of the previous time point (date after the last radiology exam) + [Value] days after the current radiological time point response date -->
AddDaysAfterMaxDateForLastRadTP: <!-- Default 42 - [Value] days after (or any time before) the radiological TPR date when there are no subsequent time points -->
